jam
Class JamCommand

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      jam.JamCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener
public class JamCommand
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener

This class recieves the commands for all the pull down menues of JamMain. It then calls the necessary methods. It is implemented by Jam.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
0.5 April 98
Author:
Ken Swartz
See Also:
JamMain

Method Detail

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
Receives all the inputs from the pull down menus that are ActionEvent's. Receives input from VME and dispatches messages.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
Parameters:

setRemote

public void setRemote(boolean on,
                      RemoteAccess ra)
Sets whether or not we are in remote mode; remote mode not yet implemented.

Parameters:
on - true if we are in remote mode
ra - remote accessor of this process
